title: Strengthening Healthcare Practice Competencies: Virtual Prevention of Unplanned Extubation in Adult ICU Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Utilize branching scenario-based virtual simulations to identify unplanned extubation risk factors with over 80% accuracy.
Apply endotracheal tube fixation and patient monitoring protocols with 90% accuracy.
Simulate at least three extubation prevention measures through team collaboration in emergency scenarios.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
